thread.title: Spore Creature Creator Trial Version Available

post.author: BNA!
post.body:
I don't know why, but I missed it...

http://fileshack.com/file.x/12328/Spore ... al+Version

post.author: pbmax
post.body:
http://www.shacknews.com/featuredarticl ... 899&page=3

goatse spore style

post.author: BNA!
post.body:
I never thought of creating someting like these creatures, but somehow the outcome of the users work does not shock me at all.

Best quote surely is:
"once you see it, you can't unsee it"

post.author: Zamideus
post.body:
Those people won tons of internets.

Thank you 4chan. Thank you.
